module.name: logging
module.summary: Policy for the kernel message logger and system logging daemon.

interface.name: logging_log_file
interface.summary: Make the specified type a file used for logs.

param.name: file_type
param.summary: Type of the file to be used as a log.

interface.name: logging_read_audit_log
interface.summary: Read the audit log.

interface.name: logging_domtrans_auditctl
interface.summary: Execute auditctl in the auditctl domain.

interface.name: logging_run_auditctl
interface.summary: Execute auditctl in the auditctl domain, and allow the specified role the auditctl domain.

param.name: role
param.summary: The role to be allowed the auditctl domain.

param.name: terminal
param.summary: The type of the terminal allow the auditctl domain to use.

interface.name: logging_domtrans_auditd
interface.summary: Execute auditd in the auditd domain.

interface.name: logging_run_auditd
interface.summary: Execute auditd in the auditd domain, and allow the specified role the auditd domain.

param.name: role
param.summary: The role to be allowed the auditd domain.

param.name: terminal
param.summary: The type of the terminal allow the auditd domain to use.

interface.name: logging_stream_connect_auditd
interface.summary: Connect to auditdstored over an unix stream socket.

interface.name: logging_manage_audit_config
interface.summary: Manage the auditd configuration files.

interface.name: logging_manage_audit_log
interface.summary: Manage the audit log.

interface.name: logging_domtrans_syslog
interface.summary: Execute syslogd in the syslog domain.

interface.name: logging_log_filetrans
interface.summary: Create an object in the log directory, with a private type using a type transition.

param.name: private type
param.summary: The type of the object to be created.

param.name: object
param.summary: The object class of the object being created.

interface.name: logging_send_syslog_msg
interface.summary: Send system log messages.

interface.name: logging_read_audit_config
interface.summary: Read the auditd configuration files.

interface.name: logging_search_logs
interface.summary: Allows the domain to open a file in the log directory, but does not allow the listing of the contents of the log directory.

interface.name: logging_dontaudit_search_logs
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to search the var log directory.

interface.name: logging_list_logs
interface.summary: List the contents of the generic log directory (/var/log).

interface.name: logging_rw_generic_log_dirs
interface.summary: Read and write the generic log directory (/var/log).

interface.name: logging_dontaudit_getattr_all_logs
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to get the atttributes of any log files.

interface.name: logging_append_all_logs
interface.summary: Append to all log files.

interface.name: logging_read_all_logs
interface.summary: Read all log files.

interface.name: logging_exec_all_logs
interface.summary: Execute all log files in the caller domain.

interface.name: logging_manage_all_logs
interface.summary: Create, read, write, and delete all log files.

interface.name: logging_read_generic_logs
interface.summary: Read generic log files.

interface.name: logging_write_generic_logs
interface.summary: Write generic log files.

interface.name: logging_rw_generic_logs
interface.summary: Read and write generic log files.

interface.name: logging_manage_generic_logs
interface.summary: Create, read, write, and delete generic log files.
